channel.title: My forum so far... Please rate (UPDATED: ALL FEABACK WELCOME)
channel.description:
Ok well this is my forum so far.. I'm not necisarily (excuse my spelling :D. I suck at spelling) looking for rateing on how it looks. I'm looking more for rates on the amount of content and how good it is.. I tried to make it a large forum so many people could use it.
For any of you who thought the homepage looks like crap... I updated... Hope you like it now.
Well here it is: [url=http://www.thetechforum.co.nr]www.thetechforum.co.nr[/url]
And yes I know it is hosted for free, but that is until i get my credit card in a few days. I will be paying for hosting at host monster once i get it.. but until then I decided to just test it on a free host. So please don't flame just because I am using a free host for now.
EDIT: Fixed link...

item.title: My forum so far... Please rate (UPDATED: ALL FEABACK WELCOME)
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Collin07, post:20, topic:212189”]A few suggestions if I may…

Go buy Photoshop CS3 and learn to make your own templates in it, it’s very useful and fun to do after you learn. You can find a tutorial on how to do it or just ask me on how to make one in Photoshop.

Buy Dreamweaver CS3 so you can do editing at websites alot easier with everything in front of you.

Do not use the .co.nr service. Go to http://www.afraid.org and sign up. Set-up a DNS for yourforum.us.to. I recommend you use Afraid.org because you are not required to advertise them and co.nr services are just to widely used.

Your main page looks good if you made it your self, but if you didn’t I suggest you try to make one on your own. I made my first website for an unsuccessful game when I was nine years old.

Use HTMLGoodies for HTML help.[/quote]

Dreamweaver is so fucking confusing. I would rather type it out by hand because then I know what I am doing.

Read full topic
item.source: My forum so far... Please rate (UPDATED: ALL FEABACK WELCOME)

item.title: My forum so far... Please rate (UPDATED: ALL FEABACK WELCOME)
item.dc:creator: @xbverx xbverx
item.description:
@xbverx wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:17, topic:212189”][quote author=io9 link=topic=279492.msg2275362#msg2275362 date=1213429079]

make the header width 100% and why you got copyright on it, no one would go near it with a 10ft barge pole.

I got copyright on it because I want to… got a problem with that?.. If you do then be quiet… that has nothing to do with rating the website…

Technically, you I have to get the copywright recognized buy a judge or something to make it mean anything. You can’t inforce that with all the money in the world at it’s status…

YOU DONT UNDERSTAND MDOG, HE ALREADY BROKE COPYRIGHT LAWS!!11
[/quote]
lol. And like the rest of us havn’t? (im not talking about mopar shit). I mean come on, how many people here do you think havn’t downloaded warez at least once in there life? [/quote]
i have not… I use completely free programs & Pay for most things

Read full topic
item.source: My forum so far... Please rate (UPDATED: ALL FEABACK WELCOME)

item.title: My forum so far... Please rate (UPDATED: ALL FEABACK WELCOME)
item.dc:creator: @Collin07 Collin07
item.description:
@Collin07 wrote:

A few suggestions if I may…

Go buy Photoshop CS3 and learn to make your own templates in it, it’s very useful and fun to do after you learn. You can find a tutorial on how to do it or just ask me on how to make one in Photoshop.

Buy Dreamweaver CS3 so you can do editing at websites alot easier with everything in front of you.

Do not use the .co.nr service. Go to http://www.afraid.org and sign up. Set-up a DNS for yourforum.us.to. I recommend you use Afraid.org because you are not required to advertise them and co.nr services are just to widely used.

Your main page looks good if you made it your self, but if you didn’t I suggest you try to make one on your own. I made my first website for an unsuccessful game when I was nine years old.

Use HTMLGoodies for HTML help.

Read full topic
